remarks: Complex exponentiation of a product.  Proposition 10-4.2(c) of [Gleason] p. 135.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
recxpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
recxpcld.2 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ A ) $.
recxpcld.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
mulcxpd.4 $e |- ( ph -> 0 <_ B ) $.
mulcxpd.5 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
mulcxpd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. B ) ^c C ) = ( ( A ^c C ) x. ( B ^c C ) ) ) $.
